__e: We found our perp O.D.'d on the same junk that he stole from his victim.
A couple of guys OD'd the other day from it.
Looks like the mother's cause of death was a drug overdose, not a car accident.
First the little one ODs, and now the fat one is bleeding out.
And I knew--I knew deep down inside he wasn't ready, but I gave the go-ahead anyway, and the night of the funeral, he overdosed and died.
See, I know her, I mean... I was there when she almost OD'd and... I just... just now she looked pretty out of it.
